casebody.data:
In the Matter of William T. HENRY, Alleged Bankrupt. John F. Condon, Jr., Petitioner-Appellant. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. November 1, 1927. No. 18. Rogers & Whitaker, of New York City (Spier Whitaker and John F. Condon, Jr., both of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Dorff & Levy, of New York City, for bankrupt and Mary C. Henry.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed.
